1010011100100101 1001011110010110 1 -> sum: 0011111010111100, cout: 1
0101111010101000 0011111010100010 1 -> sum: 1001110101001011, cout: 0
0000101100000111 1111011000001000 0 -> sum: 0000000100001111, cout: 1
